## Spotify Audio Analysis & Predictive Modeling

<h3>Spotify Audio Analysis & Predictive Modeling</h3>

<!-- NBA Subreddit Sentiment Analysis -->
:::{.callout-note collapse="false"}
## NBA Subreddit Sentiment Analysis

<h3>NBA Subreddit Sentiment Analysis</h3>

What is the attitude towards your favorite NBA team? In this project, we find out through the sentiment analysis of NBA subreddit post comments. This project utilized APIs to access Reddit comment data and perform EDA, sentiment analysis, and predictive modeling.

**Group Member(s):** Alexander Bloyer

## Sex & ADHD Prediction

<h3>Sex & ADHD Prediction</h3>

<!-- Diabetic Retinopathy Classification -->
:::{.callout-note collapse="false"}
## Diabetic Retinopathy Classification

<h3>Diabetic Retinopathy Classification</h3>

Diabetic Retinopathy is a serious condition that affects 200,000 US residents annually. This group trained a convolutional neural network on a dataset of images of patients eyes.

**Group Members:** Cyrus Navasca, Owen Feng, Shashin Gupta, Nikhil Gupta

<h3>Raccoon Analysis of UCSB</h3>
